name: Death Mark
note:
<JS On Add State>
  target._markDmg = 0;
</JS On Add State>

<JS Pre-Damage as Target>
  if(value > 0) {
    target._markDmg += value;
  }
</JS Pre-Damage as Target>

<JS On Expire State>
  if (target.isAlive() && target._markDmg && target._markDmg > 0) {
    $gameTemp.requestAnimation([target], 205);
    let dmg = Math.round(-0.25 * target._markDmg);
    setTimeout(() => {
      target.gainHp(dmg);
      target.startDamagePopup();
      target.clearResult();
      target.refresh();
      if (target.isDead()) {
        target.performCollapse();
      }
    }, 1500);
  }
  target._markDmg = 0;
</JS On Expire State>

<Help Description>
Stores damage taken.
</Help Description>
<Category: debuff>

name: weakpoint passive
note:
<JS Post-Damage as User>
if (!target || value <= 0 || !user) return;

const markStates = [147, 148, 149, 150, 151, 152];
const currentMark = markStates.find(id => target.isStateAffected(id));
const currentIndex = markStates.indexOf(currentMark);

// Fonction pour nettoyer toutes les marques
const clearAllMarks = () => {
  markStates.forEach(id => target.removeState(id));
  target.refresh();
};

// Si la cible n’a aucune marque
if (currentMark == null) {
  target.addState(markStates[0]);
  target.refresh();
}
// Si elle a entre Lv1 et Lv5
else if (currentIndex >= 0 && currentIndex < markStates.length - 1) {
  target.removeState(currentMark);
  target.addState(markStates[currentIndex + 1]);
  target.refresh();
}
// Si elle est déjà à Marque Max
else if (currentIndex === markStates.length - 1) {
  if(target.isAlive()) {
    const bonus = Math.floor((user.atk * 0.5) * (1+((target.mhp - target.hp)/target.mhp))); 
    
    setTimeout(() => {
        target.gainHp(-bonus);
        target.startDamagePopup();
        if (target._markDmg != null) {
          target._markDmg += bonus;
        }
        $gameTemp.requestAnimation([target], 2); // animation bonus
        clearAllMarks(); // retire les marques
        target.refresh();
        if (target.isDead()) {
        target.performCollapse();
        }
      }, 10); // 300 ms = assez pour séparer proprement les popups
  }
}
</JS Post-Damage as User>

<Category: debuff>
<Help Description>
Decrease ATK and M.ATK by 10%, damages the target each turn based on the latest caster’s M.ATK.
</Help Description>
<JS Slip Refresh>
<JS HP Slip Damage>
 let value = user.mat * 1.35 / (target.mdf / 10)
 damage = value;
</JS HP Slip Damage>
